```{r setup, warning = FALSE, message=FALSE}
### Load Libraries ###
library(yaml)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(data.table)
library(plotly)
library(sf)

### Load config ###
config <- yaml::yaml.load_file("Config.yml")
```

```{r Load data}
### Load the raw data ###
RT_Geo_Data <- st_read(config$data$GEO_DATA)
RT_POC_Data <- fread(config$data$POC_INFO)
```


```{r}
plot(RT_Geo_Data)
```


```{r}
WT_POC_data <- RT_POC_Data[,c(4,11,12,13,16,17)]
```
